about.title: about me
about.h2: My name is Michael Hutchinson. A web designer and web developer based in Manchester.
p: Experienced Web Developer with a history of working in the IT industry. Skilled in Web Design & Development including HTML, CSS & Javascript. Strong UX portfolio with a Masters degree in Information Technology from Leeds University.
If you want to know more just email me at michael-hutchinson@hotmail.co.uk or use the contact form at the bottom of the page.
